description: With Verizon having all hands on deck in dealing with the aftermath of Hurricane Helene, the Telecom giant experienced a sudden nationwide outage this morning, leaving millions of customers unable to send calls or texts. The outage began around 9:30 a.m. ET with customers from the Midwest reporting their cell phone service was completely down. […]
title: Sudden Verizon Outage for Millions Across the US as Company Deals With Helene Aftermath

description: The bill would have required testing of AI models to ensure they don’t lead to mass death, attacks on public infrastructure, or cyberattacks.
title: Newsom Vetoes California’s Hotly Debated Artificial Intelligence Bill

description: Audio streaming platform Spotify was back up after an approximate three-hour-long outage on Sunday, which at its peak impacted more than 40,000 users in the United States, according to Downdetector.com. Downdetector, which tracks outages through a range of sources including user reports, reported less than 600 users were still having issues in the U.S as […]
title: Spotify Back Up After Outage Hits Over 40,000 Users
